General.Name: Merus Power Oyj
General.Description: Merus Power Oyj designs, manufactures, and sells domestic energy storage, and power quality solutions and services in Finland and internationally. The company offers active harmonic filters, energy storage system, hybrid power quality products, static synchronous compensators, and static var compensators. It also provides SVC modernization and power quality measurement services. The company offers its solutions for heavy and light industries, commercial buildings, infrastructure and utilities, and renewable energy applications. Merus Power Oyj was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Nokia, Finland.
